alertTaskExists.title: Task already exists!
alertTaskExists.message: A task with the same name already exists. Please choose a different name.

alertTaskRemove.title: Remove task?
alertTaskRemove.message: Are you sure you want to remove the task {{name}}?

home.emptyListTitle: You don't have any tasks registered yet

alertSubTaskExists.title: Sub-task already exists!
alertSubTaskExists.message: A sub-task with the same name already exists. Please choose a different name.

alertSubTaskRemove.message: Are you sure you want to remove the sub-task {{subTaskName}}?
